description.part1: A Frontend Developer focused on React
description.part2: motivated to build the interface of your web applications

about.title: A little about me
about.part1: A passion for programming, a determination to reinvent myself, and expertise in front-end web development with a specialization in React.
about.part1Bis: At 43 years old, I am proud to embark on an exciting career as a front-end developer.
about.part2: After 15 years of experience on controlling in various companies, I decided to switch to front-end development.
about.part2Bis: I have followed training courses at OpenClassrooms as a web developer and front-end developer specialising in React.
about.part3: Over the past 2 years, I was able to acquire a wealth of skills and knowledge through a variety of projects in different programming languages and in different professional situations.
about.part4: When I'm not behind a computer, I enjoy spending time with my family, playing football with my friends or playing video games.I'm open to job offers that allow me to learn and progress. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience, don't hesitate to contact me!
about.part5: What I have learnt in my professional life:

skills.title: Skills

description.part2: What can I do for you:

skills.part1: Creating dynamic web applications with Javascript and React
skills.part2: Setting up complex dashboards with graphs
skills.part3: Resolving technical issues and modernizing/optimizing your code
skills.part5: Implementing unit tests and debugging code

skills.intro: I've been learning web development for about 2 years now, and I'm always eager to learn more in this fast paced industry.

description.part1: Do you have a project in mind or just want to say hello?
description.part2: Feel free to send me a message!
